unnormalised: Hey folks, ever wondered where all that Diwali mithai ka dabba ends up? Well, waste management is becoming a HUGE deal, especially here in India!
normalised: Hey folks, ever wondered where all that Diwali mithai ka dabba ends up? Well, waste management is becoming a huge deal, especially here in India!

unnormalised: Remember that catchy song from "Swades" about cleaning our villages? Turns out, the message is more relevant than ever. The National Environmental Engineering Research Institute (NEERI) in Nagpur is actually piloting some cool new tech for converting solid waste into biogas – talk about "Kachre se Kanchan"!

unnormalised: Apparently, cities like Mumbai are struggling with mountains of waste, leading to health hazards and clogged drains (classic monsoon problem, right?). The BMC is now trying to implement stricter segregation rules. They're hoping to reduce the amount of waste ending up in landfills like the Deonar one by, like, 20% in the next year.
